subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky, who the Islanders were hoping could play the point on the power play, stayed in Slovakia with his K.H.L. team instead of reporting to camp.
snippet: Defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky, who the Islanders were hoping could play the point on the power play, stayed in Slovakia with his K.H.L. team instead of reporting to camp.
